ps3.2:6.11: Ekattagataṃ → ekaggataṃ (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1) | nānattakilesehi → nānattakilese (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1)
ps3.2:14.20: rūpiṃ → rūpaṃ (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1, mr) | sabbaṅgapaccaṅgiṃ → sabbaṅgapaccaṅgaṃ (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1, mr)
ps3.2:15.7: indavaṇṇaṃ vā → asuravaṇṇaṃ vā dasseti, indavaṇṇaṃ vā (si, sya-all)
ps3.2:26.2: cakkavattī → cakkavatti (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1) | assabandhagopurise → assabandhagobandhapurise (bj); assabandhagopake purise (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1)
